headline: Solar Leader Enphase Energy Cutting 500 Jobs
summary: California-based Enphase Energy, a company known for its solar power and electric vehicle (EV) charging technology, announced it is laying off about 500 workers. The company in a Nov. 8 […]

headline: Enphase introduces DIY permitting feature to Solargraf platform
summary: The addition aims to make the cloud-based Solargraf platform a comprehensive solution for solar installers.
